author: {'steamid': '76561198419230794', 'num_games_owned': 1172, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 220, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 220, 'last_played': 1520522966}
review:
玩hidden folks的时候我在想，如果是全彩的会是什么效果？然后我发现了这个游戏=v=
不同于hidden folks的解谜式找东西，Under Leaves以给动物们找食物为主题，把所有要找的物件都摆在了明面上——隐藏在自然环境的保护色彩之中。宝蓝、浅缥、道奇蓝，若緑、萌葱、青灰绿，狐色、卡其、黒茶色...[strike]色盲测试不了解一下吗233[/strike] 治愈水彩风的画面，搭配清新自然风的BGM，很适合一边吃零食一边玩【喂
双击画面可以放大，然而一寸寸找过去依然卡在12/13之类也是经常会有的...自抱自泣一通乱点的时候往往会有“我瞎了？”的不可置信之感_(:з」∠)_
提示设置的很有趣，是类似于华容道的拼图游戏，完成拼图可以获得一次位置提示，然而有一种成就叫做【不看提示通关】_(:з」∠)_
总之算是个很可爱的找东西游戏w

author: {'steamid': '76561198327292437', 'num_games_owned': 200, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 285, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1618562351}
review:
我妈先是问我为什么在玩这种早教游戏，然后就来帮我做无提示成就了……

以找蚯蚓为首的反人类落叶地图，海星真的是要把眼睛晃瞎……反倒第二页的澳洲地图是最简单的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198331555490', 'num_games_owned': 1519, 'num_reviews': 900, 'playtime_forever': 196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 196, 'last_played': 1521047469}
review:
동물들과 함꼐하는 숨은 그림 찾기 게임.

다양한 자연 환경에 숨어 있는 물체들을 찾으면 되는 간단한 진행 방식의 숨은 그림 찾기 게임으로, 특이하게 하나의 스테이지에는 한 마리의 "큰" 동물이 존재하고 이 동물이 뭔가 - 도마뱀, 나뭇잎 등등 크기가 상대적으로 작은 오브젝트이다 - 를 찾아달라고 하는 방식으로 진행된다. 스테이지 내 색깔 팔레트가 통일되어 있어서 하나의 레벨 내 존재하는 물체들 / 동물들이 어우러지는 방식을 보이는데, 이 색감 선택이 생각보다 눈에 편안함과 동시에 몇몇 물체를 찾는 데는 전혀 도움이 안 된다. 다행히, 이 게임은 힐링 게임이기 때문에 충분한 시간만 있으면 레벨을 클리어하는 데 부담이 되지 않으며, 게임 내 존재하는 확대 기능이 꽤 유용하기 때문에 한 레벨을 대강 훑어본 뒤 확대 기능을 써서 다시 살펴보면 레벨 클리어가 그렇게 힘들지 않았다.


결론적으로, 그냥저냥 편안하게 즐길 수 있는 숨은그림 찾기 게임이라 추천. 플레이타임이 그렇게 긴 게임은 아니지만, 정가 대비 플레이타임은 나쁘지 않고, 할인도 종종 하는 게임이라 개인적으로는 어느 정도 할인할 때 구매하는 걸 권장한다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198367894395', 'num_games_owned': 1165, 'num_reviews': 713, 'playtime_forever': 261, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 164, 'last_played': 1568604658}
review:
회사 점심시간에 잠깐 할 만한 힐링게임을 찾다가 발견한 "언더 리브스". 연휴의 마지막 밤에 방에서 끝내버렸다는 문제가 있긴 하지만... 수채화 톤의 그래픽이 독특한 숨은그림찾기 게임이다. 세계 곳곳에 서식하는 동물들을 따라 다니며 숨은 먹이를 찾아주는 것이 목표. 동물마다 다른 지도는 아니고, 먹이 찾기를 완료한 지도에 다시 방문해서 다른 동물의 먹이를 찾는 방식이다. 한 종류의 자연환경에 여러 동물들이 각자의 먹이를 구하며 공존하고 있다는 걸 숨은그림찾기를 통해 새삼스럽게 느끼게 하는 면도 있어서, 아이들과 같이 하기에도 교육적으로 좋을 것 같다.

>> [url=http://realkkan.blog.me/221211340848]스크린샷을 포함한 평가 전문 읽기 [/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198061475784', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 83, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83, 'last_played': 1518937509}
review:
Lovely hidden object game. Pretty, colourful art with soothing ambient noise and music, it's definitely the kind of game you would want to take your time playing.

I really like that the objects in the original locations are cleverly hidden, though I can't say the same for the recent update; it seemed a lot easier and "rushed out". The art in the new locations is also a lot simpler compared to the older locations. But hey, it's a free update, so I ain't complaining. Although, for new players, it might be better if you play the new locations first before the older ones as a way to ease into the game.

Still, the pros outweigh the cons, would definitely recommend this unique little HO game for people who want to have a chill time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058686049', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1527315498}
review:
Bei Under Leaves handelt es sich um eine schlichtes Wimmelbildspiel. Ihr bekommt die Aufgabe eine bestimmte Anzahl an Nahrungsmitteln verschiedener Tierarten zu finden. 

Vom Schwierigkeitslevel ist dieses Game eindeutig für Kinder ausgelegt. Ich habe zum vollständigen Finden aller versteckten Objekte ungefähr eine Stunde gebraucht. 

Die Grafik ist sehr einfach gehalten, aber dennoch schön anzusehen. 

Großes Manko gibt es für fehlende Ingameeinstellungen. Ich rate dazu, das Game nicht mit einem Headset auf dem Kopf zu starten bzw. dieses vorher leise zu stellen. Es gibt Ingame nicht die Möglichkeit die Lautstärke zu regulieren. 

Ich habe mir Under Leaves im Angebot für ca. 3,50 €  gekauft. Mehr würde ich dafür aber auch nicht ausgeben.

author: {'steamid': '76561198147225023', 'num_games_owned': 242, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1520369930}
review:
Очень приятная и коротенькая игрушка для любителей поднапрячь глаза в поисках хитроумно спрятанных предметов. Вместе с этим обучалка для детей о животных: кто живет под листвой? - а также под водой, в пустыне, в степи, на берегу, на разных материках и в разных океанах.

Отдельно хочется выделить саундтрек этой игры: он просто великолепен - качественный филдрекординг с аккуратным, не навязчивым вплетением разных этнических мотивов, в зависимости от местности - просто потрясающий. Создает полное погружение в гуашевые (как мне показалось) полотна фонов, отображающих разную местность. Словно всерьез оказываешься в стилизованных джунглях, саваннах, лесах. Аудио-визуальная составляющая дарит умиротворение и даже уже не так бесят все никак не могущие отыскаться предметы.

Думаю, что у маленького ребенка она будет развивать внимательность и способность лучше различать формы, цвета и оттенки.

Противопоказана больным дальтонизмом. Извините, ребята, но вы в неё не сможете...

Авторам большое спасибо и небольшая просьба: может стоит сделать названия основных зверушек, видимыми при наведении? А то они выдны только в открывающихся ачивках и только на латыни - не всегда понятно какое животное перед тобой.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052802708', 'num_games_owned': 1437, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 271, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 136, 'last_played': 1533118199}
review:
Under Leaves is a delightful game that reminded me a great deal of Botanicula in it's art style. Unlike Botanicula however Under Leaves is not about solving puzzles but merely searching for shapes.

In this respect Under Leavs does an excellent job, the clever use of shape and tones of colour make it glorious to both just admire as well as search for the animals food.

There are a few issues though, it's quite clear the game was designed more with a touch screen in mind, as the mouse often struggles to click but works better when swiping. This felt a little strange to me, since I'm used to more responsiveness when clicking. Movement across the screen was a little weird and the most annoying point was the zooming in and out function that would occasionally require multiple clicks before actually responding to the input.

All in all, the game is beautifully created, and well worth a play as it is quite cheap, plus I enjoyed the additional feel of raising environmental awareness through a video game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198212115887', 'num_games_owned': 141, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 95, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1517220178}
review:
很治愈，帮动物们找吃的。画风也很治愈。 
这种画风好的找东西的小游戏其实是最适合小朋友的，然而我玩了一个多小时感觉就快瞎了。
要是本印刷制品就好了。不过印刷制品就做不到动态了。矛盾啊！期待有一天电脑屏幕都是标配护眼的。

Everything is fantastic  except  doing much damage to my vision.  I think this game is designed for children  but it may be bad for their eyes .

author: {'steamid': '76561198273087622', 'num_games_owned': 296, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 395, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 170, 'last_played': 1519308626}
review: Sometimes you just need to play a simple game and relax. Under Leaves is a colorful hidden object game with an incredibly serene music score. With only 29 levels, it can easily be completed in an hour, still I would highly recommend this game for anyone looking to pass time in a soothing atmosphere.

author: {'steamid': '76561198204197672', 'num_games_owned': 94, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 228, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 135, 'last_played': 1636816519}
review: 超美，我这种星际选手都能玩得下去。

author: {'steamid': '76561198808110269', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 75, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75, 'last_played': 1517973759}
review:
My boyfriend bought this game for me as a present because he's cute and knows that I love casual seek-and-find games among many others. Playing this was a lot more fun and was a lot longer than I originally anticipated. While the early levels and the levels in the second area of the map are very easy and short, some of the levels took us a long time and finding everything was challenging! (the All Orange Everything levels made me so grumpy..) The animals are cute and the idea of helping them find what they ask for is really happy. I would recommend this game to anyone who is looking for a cute, casual, affordable game that won't be over after an hour!! I found that it's good to even play if you're with someone because they can participate as well. 
PS. the music and animal sounds are very relaxing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198173269005', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 446, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 446, 'last_played': 1517794805}
review: Got it on sale. A great game to wind down with before bed or to relax when anxiety sets in. Super soothing and the objects are never *too* difficult to find.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123505885', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1517499408}
review:
Очень красивая игра, которая сразу погружает в атмосферу природы. Очень красочная, яркая и интересная. Развивает внимательность и ум. Левел с хорьками вообще топовый. Чтобы воспользоваться подсказкой, надо решить головоломку!

author: {'steamid': '76561198300747804', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 250, 'playtime_forever': 1038, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 621, 'last_played': 1595029910}
review:
A relaxing and fairly easy puzzle game.  The art and music are very lovely.  It's a small game but well-made.  Something which makes it more relaxing than most other hidden object games is that many screens have areas that are more empty, which gives your mind and eyes some breathing room as you search.  The animals are very cute and make a sound or move a little when you get all the food for them.

Edit:  My 5 year old niece loves this game and always wants to pay it when she visits.  A good game for an inquisitive child that loves animals.

author: {'steamid': '76561198130135721', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 269, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 269, 'last_played': 1517173084}

author: {'steamid': '76561198151163731', 'num_games_owned': 1632, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 475, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 225, 'last_played': 1527275216}

author: {'steamid': '76561198055096221', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1530921789}

author: {'steamid': '76561198262118401', 'num_games_owned': 2421, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 128, 'last_played': 1518192842}
review:
Ein wunderschönes Wimmelbildspiel, das sich hervorragend dazu eignet, nach einem stressigen Tag für etwas Entspannung zu sorgen. Die Grafik ist sehr hübsch und stimmig, die Soundkulisse ebenfalls passend.
Ein ganz großes Lob möchte ich hier an die Entwickler richten, die diese Tage ein [i]kostenloses[/i] Update mit 8 neuen Levels veröffentlicht haben. Den Preis von 5 Euro halte ich für fair, denn selbst wenn man einen Durchgang in unter 2 Stunden schafft, gegen weitere Durchgänge ist nichts einzuwenden. Und vielleicht spendieren die Entwickler ja noch weitere Updates.
Ein rundum gelungenes Spiel für Groß & Klein - Danke!

author: {'steamid': '76561198042619224', 'num_games_owned': 467, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 166, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 166, 'last_played': 1517074539}
review:
This is a hidden object game with beautifully-drawn watercolour images, each showing a scene in nature. It works entirely without text. In every level, you'll find an animal that you collect food for - starfish, acorns, flowers etc.
There are basically two ways to play this game:

1) Enjoy the gentle background music and sounds and click through the screens in a relaxed manner. At some point, you may have to use the help function because you can't find the last few items. Ah, what a soothing experience, just right for some casual gaming.

2) Notice that the game has an achievement for never using the help function. Scan through every screen meticulously. When that doesn't work anymore, use the magnification function (which you aren't told about! tsk, tsk!! - just double-click on any area of the screen). Search, search again, take a short break, search on and find the last hard-to-spot three-leaf flower. Grit your teeth and repeat for most every later level. Yes, I'm doing this for fun, why are you asking?
Okay, more seriously: If you try to make it entirely without help, your experience may be a bit more demanding in regard to persistence. Your choice!! 

I do recommend this game in any case. Just mentioning that I got 3 h of playtime out of it while using method 2, so make your own judgement on whether you want to get it on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198377534600', 'num_games_owned': 986, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 95, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1516941840}
review:
这是一款手绘水彩风格的寻找物件类解谜游戏，画面精美，配色和谐有美感，音乐舒缓治愈，音效巨大亮点：鸟叫虫鸣声起起落落，模拟自然环境且代入感十足，意料之外的竟然连自然环境下蚊虫振翅飞舞的声音都加入音效里实在是难得！

此外还有一些个人觉得具有特色的加分项：
1. 游戏全程没有文字（除了数字），所有的信息均用图画的形式呈现说明，表达简明清晰。
2. 双击画面会出现的放大功能与将隐藏物品的全部配色列出这两处设计体现了制作组的细心程度与游戏的完整度。
3. 提示功能设计得很有特色：通过解开类似华容道的小迷题（我实在是不知道该怎么形容）来获取提示一次，而且下一个提示会在上一个提示使用过后一段时间后才出现，这样的设计，既有游戏难度来增加成就感，又保证玩家的游戏体验（不存在卡关）。
4. 游戏寻找物品时画面动静结合的感觉很微妙，体验很不错。

最后，游戏设计也很有逻辑性，比如[spoiler]蚯蚓绝对不会出现在树上，橡子只会结在橡树枝上（如果你知道橡树叶长啥样就能在游戏中很快找到）或者落在地上....[/spoiler]

但是容我鸡蛋里挑骨头地说两句：找鼻涕虫也太难了吧！！黏在树干上我就死活也看不见了，头都要抠破了。圆心鱼是什么鬼啊，一条鱼中间一个波点什么的也太抽象了吧，跟游戏画风都不符合了！感觉并不是自然界的动物吧....对那一关的自然环境模拟差评，零代入感。

author: {'steamid': '76561198453980160', 'num_games_owned': 121, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 146, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 146, 'last_played': 1516946501}
review:
本来是看着音乐和美工来的，没想到是一个找茬游戏，对于平常生活中东西就摆在我面也看不到的人来说，太痛苦了，但是每次帮助它们找完，总感觉很温馨。
   是一个老少皆宜的游戏，当我找不到的时候，我的朋友帮我找了好几次，他还说我是真的瞎了TT。
   是一款很有意思的游戏，但不要玩太久 ，适当的休息眼睛。

author: {'steamid': '76561198453684450', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 166, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1530725357}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198264986971', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1602546651}
review:
看了评论再玩的游戏，进游戏之前还挺担心自己会不会是色弱，玩了一会儿发现我的担心是多余的，我只是单纯的瞎而已。中规中矩的一款寻物游戏，游戏玩法就是小动物点餐叫外卖，比如虵会说：“今天想吃四脚蛇，要吃九只才过瘾。”接单后我们就要去附近找食材。不过生物进化不是开玩笑的，生鲜食材外表已经进化得与周围环境融为一体，所以在几叠图片组成的大地图里寻找披着保护色外衣的小东西着实不易。玩了一个半小时全成就通关，我的卡姿兰大眼睛有点花，刚才回头把室友给错认成猪惹！
ps:该游戏和hidden folks配合使用效果更加

author: {'steamid': '76561198068476859', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 212, 'last_played': 1514330225}
review:
Under Leaves a very relaxing, albeit short, hidden object game with a lovely art style.
I completed this game twice on one day, even on the second playthrough some of the objects are very difficult to find. If you get stuck, there is a nice hint system in place with it's own little puzzle to solve before it helps you out.

One point to mention: because of the way objects are hidden, the game will be near impossible to beat for persons with certain types of color blindness.

author: {'steamid': '76561198151642388', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 178, 'last_played': 1521590660}
review: I found Under Leaves to be a pleasant casual hidden-object game.  It might have taken me about an hour to play though 20 levels, so it isn't very long.  Unlike some other hidden-object-type games, each level requires you to look for a set amount of one specific object, with variations in color only.  This can sometimes be very difficult; I spent some levels searching a long time for the last item I needed, but others were finished up very easily.  There is no storyline in the typical sense, and the art style is very pleasing and atmospheric, with a soothing soundtrack.  This is a short, relaxing game I'd recommend for the experience if you're looking for something inexpensive to buy, but once you've played it through there isn't much point to playing it again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026946873', 'num_games_owned': 1783, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 177, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 177, 'last_played': 1517076670}
review:
This is a simple search and find game, where you have a certain item to look for, and a area in which to look for it.


Pros:
[i]I love search and find games, so hopefully this review is helpful even with a bit of happy bias. xD[/i]
+The artwork to me is aesthetically pleasing.
+The color scheme is beautiful and works well with the overall art of the game.
+For me it was a easy 100% game. (I LOVE GAMES LIKE THIS) *is totally not a nerd* ♥u♥
+There were 2 Foxes :DDDDD(FOXES ARE MY FAVORITE ANIMAL)
+It is very tranquil, gives a nice vibe with the soft music.
+Relaxing to play, no time limit to find things, no rush to finish.
+Gameplay was rather smooth, no real hiccups.

Cons:
[i]Honestly none, but I put what I thought could possibly be downsides.[/i]
-The items you look for blend in rather well, so a few are a bit tidious..
-Only 20 levels...So its not that long of a game.

Overall, if you want a relaxing game to 100%, where you don't have to worry about time or anything like that, then this is the game for you. I enjoyed every second of playing time, because they music was so calming for me. If you buy it, I hope you enjoy it like I did.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119821785', 'num_games_owned': 334, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 102, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 87, 'last_played': 1508326739}
review:
84分钟一周目全成就，感觉没有热门评测说得那么难。不过这个游戏的晚点应该也不在于难度，而是氛围。
游戏的画面十分明快，是儿童绘本的感觉，搭配闲适的配乐和自然音效，让人心情愉快
而且关卡也可以重置，同时每一次的重置后藏物位置貌似也会变化，极大增强了耐玩性
虽然是原价买的，不亏~

author: {'steamid': '76561198092669392', 'num_games_owned': 3585, 'num_reviews': 345, 'playtime_forever': 130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1505658313}
review:
[h1] Under Leaves – шикарная игра в жанре «Поиск предметов» от Circus Atos [/h1]

Under Leaves вышла 27 апреля 2017 года в магазине Steam. Цена на данный продукт составляет 129 рублей в России и 2.99$ на территории стран СНГ. 

[list]

[*] Under Leaves проста во всём. Геймплей самый обычный, как и во всех играх данного жанра. У вас есть возможность приближать камеру, если вам тяжело присматриваться к картинке. 
В Under Leaves ваша задача найти все элементы окружающей среды, чтобы помочь какому-то животному, тем самым открыв его на глобальной карте и открыв ачивку. Я считаю что игра была сделана для детей, чтобы дети имели представление где живут условные животные. Играть приятно, а чтобы получить помощь по поиску вещи вам будет нужно пройти маленькую головоломку. Всего в игре не слишком много уровней, но их прохождение зависит полностью от вашей внимательности, ведь каждая вещь сливается с окружающей средой. Геймплейно игра ничем не выделяется от остальных игр в этом жанре.

[*] Вот графически игра замечательная. Мир прорисован до всех деталей, а музыка на заднем плане погружает вас в чудный и сказочный мир маленьких зверюшек. 

[/list]

Вердикт: очень красивая игра. Геймплей ничем не выделяется, но и зачем изменять что-то, если всё и так замечательно работает? Цена на данную игру очень маленькая, поэтому любителям расслабится вечерком поиском предметов настоятельно рекомендую.

author: {'steamid': '76561198279727391', 'num_games_owned': 429, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 225, 'last_played': 1503684290}
review:
太可爱了！
画风太可爱了！背景音也像在自然界一样。
小动物也好可爱！
而且在找接下来的小东西的时候，之前遇见的动物们也在陪伴着。真好啊。
喜欢。

[strike]我变瞎了，也变强了。[/strike]

想起里尔克的《秋日》啊。
主啊，是时候了。夏天盛极一时。
把你的阴影置于日晷上，
让风吹过牧场。
让枝头最后的果实饱满。
再给两天南方的好天气，
催它们成熟，把最后的甘甜压进浓酒。
谁此时没有房子，就不必建造。
谁此时孤独，就永远孤独。
就醒来，读书，写长长的信。
在林荫路上不停地
徘徊，落叶纷飞。

author: {'steamid': '76561198326024118', 'num_games_owned': 30, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1503501971}
review:
好玩好玩！
强烈推荐给手残党们！
这款游戏治愈了我在动作类游戏中收获的心灵创伤！
非常可爱的画面和贴合自然的游戏音效，以及友善的没有任何操作难度只需要点点点的游戏模式！
让我们这些有慧眼的聪明女孩感受到了游戏的温暖与乐趣！
感谢制作者！谢谢你们！我爱你们！

author: {'steamid': '76561198217767148', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 89, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59, 'last_played': 1589204597}
review:
수채화풍 그림이 너무 좋고, 배경음이 잔잔한 게 너무 좋아요.
물 속 일렁일렁한 거나, 풀이 바람에 살랑이는 표현도 너무 좋네요.
힐링용으로 딱 좋은 거 같아요!
동물들도 엄청 귀엽고요!
숨은그림찾기라 눈에 잘 안 띌 수도 있는데, 천천히 찾으면 되더라고요.
아쉬운 점은 세세한 설정을 바꿀 수 없다는 것 뿐이에요.
소리를 줄이거나, 화면 크기를 조절할 수는 없지만 게임을 즐기는데 문제는 없습니다!

author: {'steamid': '76561198095316604', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 99, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 89, 'last_played': 1564841147}
review:
Es ist ein wirklich sehr niedliches und schönes Spiel.
Vielleicht ist es eher ein Spiel für Kinder oder es
hat den Anschein, aber es macht auch den älteren
Personen Spaß und das Rätselfieber ist dabei, denn
es bleibt nicht in allen Ebenen so einfach, wie bei den
ersten beiden Ebenen. Das Spiel hat mich (+ meine Familie)
mitgerissen und wir konnten gar nicht aufhören, die passenden
Stücke, die gesucht werden sollen, zu finden.

Ich kann dieses Spiel jedem empfehlen, der es liebt,
zu rätseln bzw. in einem Bild bestimmte Sachen zu finden.

Mir wurde dieses Spiel geschenkt und ich finde, dass
ist ein sehr schönes und niedliches Geschenk. 
Das Spiel macht einem Freude und es hat eine beruhigen Wirkung.

author: {'steamid': '76561198173332746', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 225, 'last_played': 1517081630}

author: {'steamid': '76561198286724621', 'num_games_owned': 2514, 'num_reviews': 453, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1500350212}
review:
[h1]如果想一周目拿到全成就，不要点提示！[/h1]

隐藏寻物。帮动物找隐藏物品（多半是吃的）。当真是应了自然选择啊，要不是藏这么好，这些食物早被吃光了！

+地图中很多会动元素，树叶、动物、鱼群、波浪…...尤其海底效果特别好看。
+音乐轻松好听，有个地图能听到蜜蜂在耳边嗡嗡叫。
+画面精美，截图+n
+/-测色弱游戏，对我来说，难度从高到低：黄>橙>蓝>绿。黄色地图的物品真心看不清且找不到，绿色地图都都用不上放大镜。

author: {'steamid': '76561198210814135', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1517211735}
review:
1.26更新
新更新了一张大地图，新地图上有几个新关卡。新关卡难度较低，且和旧关卡相互独立，不需完成旧关卡也可以进行新关卡。但并不知道那个全程不用提示的成就是否包含新关卡，因为我是在新关卡更新前达成的那个成就……
————————————————————————
画面，很治愈；音乐，很治愈；玩法……一点都不治愈！！！游戏的玩法就是在场景中放入一些和场景色非常相近的小玩意让你找，全成就的话要求不能用提示，而且每次物件的位置都不一样，所以想把位置记下来二周目再用什么的完全不可能……玩的实在很让人崩溃。
不过不能因为这个就说这个游戏不好。商店页面的截图明确告知了游戏的玩法和难度，我也是看中了这点并出于对自己眼睛的迷之自信才买下的这个游戏……然后努力了一个半小时之后，我终于一周目全成就通关了。
游戏里除了最后通关的the end外没有任何文字，所以没有任何教学，也就没有告知玩家其实双击屏幕可以放大这一区域……好像玩家们都是自己在游戏中偶然才发现这个功能的。
画风和音乐都很不错，极大的缓解了我在死活找不到的时候的烦躁感。而且虽然心累，但并没有出现上次玩这类型游戏时眼睛痛和疲劳的情况，我猜可能是因为画面比较柔和的缘故。

总的来说这是个很不错的游戏，如果你能接受这种玩法的话，很值得入手。

author: {'steamid': '76561197970585058', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 156, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1518902752}
review:
A game with an aardvark in it. So it's obviously really good.

Very stylistic, well drawn and unusual artwork. Nice relaxing music. And things to find by clicking on them. It's an unusual Hidden Object experience, and that's a [i]good[/i] thing. 

Apart from the graphic style, it differs in that you have to collect a certain amount of the same object at a time. Another thing which is different is that most of the 'levels' have multiple screens. This is quite clever, because you can spend ages looking in detail at a particular screen, only to realise later that the object you are looking for isn't even on that screen, or that you've already found all of them on that screen.

I also really like the idea of having a little puzzle to activate the hints. This could be expanded on, as it's pretty trivial. But it does make you feel like you're at least contributing a little effort to get hints, and definitely means you can't do so by accident. I'd love to see a two-tier hint system if there is another similar title; one to show you which screen an object is on, and the other to actually locate it.

A very short but sweet HO game. I highly expect I'll play it again in a while, as it so far is quite unique and rather relaxing.

It also has an aardvark in it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197966463007', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1500820166}
review: Ein sehr schön gemachtes Suchspiel bei dem man in verschiedenen Szenarien für die Tiere Sachen suchen muss. Teilweise ganz gut versteckt. In ca. 3 Stunden hat man das Abenteuer beendet und alles gefunden incl. allen Erfolgen. Für alle Perfekten-Spiele-Jäger ein einfaches Spiel.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012266978', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 107, 'last_played': 1519160172}
review: After playing Hidden Folks I was in the mood for more hidden object games in that vein, and Under Leaves mostly delivers in that aspect albeit in a much simpler way. The game is relaxing and lovely, with a charming picturebook art style and ambient soundtrack. However, don't go in to this game looking for a challenge--while it does get a little trickier in the later levels, it will not take long to go through the game, and what you see is what you get as there are no interactive areas or puzzles to solve. Sometimes, however, short and simple is all you want!

author: {'steamid': '76561198034286355', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 327, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 106, 'last_played': 1541125777}
review: Loved this! Just wish it were a lot longer than it is. Maybe they will come out with more someday. Deffinately worth a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561198343185475', 'num_games_owned': 477, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 207, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 207, 'last_played': 1499545241}
review: 很好的游戏，画面精美，都是小动物，还有森林啊海洋啊，BGM也很好听，小动物超可爱的，找的元素都是一些花鸟鱼虫，前面10几关没什么压力，后面有点难找，但是不用提示还是可以找到的~~~·不到3小时全成就，已经瞎了，挂卡合成的背景肯定很好看~~

author: {'steamid': '76561198223236784', 'num_games_owned': 286, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 139, 'last_played': 1562503230}
review:
Игра, которая поможет расслабиться. Красивые и милые акварельные рисунки, атмосферный и успокивающий саундтрек. Из минусов отметила бы, что игру можно пройти за час, хотя разработчики обещают добавить новые уровни. 
За свою цену, игра очень порадовала, советую.

author: {'steamid': '76561198216635141', 'num_games_owned': 2327, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 265, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 265, 'last_played': 1499496228}
review:
为各种小动物帮忙找东西的游戏，画风很喜欢，音乐也可以，就是玩的过程中时常怀疑自己大概是个色盲or色弱吧_(:3」∠)_

author: {'steamid': '76561198129433215', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1518825125}
review:
動物たちが欲しがっているものを風景の中から探してくるゲームです。

ゆったりとした音楽と鮮やかな色彩で描かれた風景や動物たち。
ザ・癒し。

最初は意気揚々と目的のものを探しているのですが、だんだん脱線して勝手に世界を膨らませていく子供と一緒に遊んでいます。
結構見つけるのが難しいのもあって、自分が頭を抱えております。

author: {'steamid': '76561198126246691', 'num_games_owned': 569, 'num_reviews': 91, 'playtime_forever': 220, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1517490286}
review:
游戏里的一切都很可爱，就是全成就后我又快瞎了。
游戏难度中等，全靠眼力，需要寻找的物品并不会遮挡起来，光明正大的放在玩家面前，靠色彩迷惑玩家。
游戏自带放大图片和提示功能，完成一个滑动拼图就能获得提示；但是有一个成就是“不使用提示功能通关”，全成就党需要注意一下。

author: {'steamid': '76561198152935161', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 128, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 128, 'last_played': 1498969509}
review:

节奏舒缓 画风清新

沉淀浮躁 
静下心来才会看到 找到 你需要的东西

author: {'steamid': '76561198018893258', 'num_games_owned': 3719, 'num_reviews': 744, 'playtime_forever': 227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1516872684}
review:
オブジェクト探しゲーム。
絵本のようなアートワークとアンビエントなBGMの雰囲気の中で指定されたオブジェクトを探していくゲームだ。全21ステージ。
内容的には子供向けであるが色彩のためかオブジェクトは意外に探すのが大変だ。ヒント機能を使うには9マスのスライドパズルを解く必要がある。ゲーム自体は本当にオブジェクト探しだけなので、それを許容して雰囲気を楽しみつつのんびりプレイするには良いゲームだと思う。

author: {'steamid': '76561198371696855', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 353, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 222, 'last_played': 1527312821}
review: 还是挺好玩的！就在我为了做成就二周目的时候，突然发现原来双击画面可以放大！！！！！！很惊喜有没有……画面美，喜欢这个画风！音乐也很棒！！！

author: {'steamid': '76561197970728166', 'num_games_owned': 551, 'num_reviews': 202, 'playtime_forever': 117, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 70, 'last_played': 1621106789}
review:
[h1][url=store.steampowered.com/app/567030/Under_Leaves/]Under Leaves[/url] can be pleasantly relaxing if approached without grand expectations. Beautiful, short, unpretentious.[/h1]

Seek simple patterns concealed in a handful of lovely animated watercolor environments, always solely looking for one thing at a time. Complete collections to reveal tiny additions to the world in splatters of complementary color, and unlock the next one.

[h1]Positive[/h1]
[list]
[*] Superbly delicate artwork.
[*] Cute animals and charming environments.
[*] Relaxing ambiant soundtrack and sounds of nature.
[*] Simple controls: drag to scroll, double-click to zoom.
[*] Optionally solve a sliding tile puzzle to receive a hint.
[/list]

[h1]Negative[/h1]
[list]
[*] No puzzles or emerging challenges: everything is in plain sight.
[*] Unfairly same-colored items layered over monochromatic backgrounds may be difficult to spot for younger kids or players with limited eyesight.
[*] Extremely short at full price (less than 2 hours of content).
[/list]

author: {'steamid': '76561198333215337', 'num_games_owned': 294, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 284, 'last_played': 1518788957}
review:
เกมหาของในภาพวาดตีมสัตว์ต่างๆและถิ่นที่อยู่(?) ซึ่งเน้นความมุ้งมิ้งและสดใสด้วยสีน้ำ ด่านน้อยไปมากๆเมื่อเทียบกับราคา 

ข้อดีของเกมนี้...
1. ถ้าต้องการเสพภาพวาดสีน้ำสีสวยๆ เกมนี้มีให้
2. เกมไม่ง่ายนะ แต่ให้ความrelaxมากจริงๆ เหมาะกับทุกเพศทุกวัย ด้วยดนตรีประกอบ และมีตัวช่วยให้ แต่ตัวช่วยไม่ได้ใช้ฟรีนะ ต้องเล่นมินิเกมเล็กน้อยด้วย เป็นเกมเลื่อนตัวต่อ9ช่อง (ซึ่งเมื่อใช้ตัวช่วยจะอดachievementตอนท้ายอันนึงอีกต่างหาก) 
3. มี achivement และมีการ์ด(ซึ่งน่ารักและดีต่อใจมาก)

ข้อเสียของเกมนี้...
1. เรามองว่าฉากและด่านยังน้อยมากจริงๆ(26ด่าน) แม้ว่าภาพจะสวยมาก แต่จริงๆพอตั้งใจดูดีๆจะพบว่ามีอยู่ไม่กี่อัน อาศัยการลบตรงนู้น ปะตรงนี้หน่อย ซึ่งเรามองว่าไม่ค่อยโอเคนัก มาทางนี้ควรขายงานอาร์ตให้สุด
2. ราคาโหดร้ายต่อกระเป๋าตังมาก เนื่องจากข้อเสียข้อแรก และเมื่อเทียบจริงๆเล่นจบได้ภายใน2ชม. เราโดนไปตอน steam summer sale ลดไป -30% ที่ราคาประมาณ 90 บาท แนะนำให้กดตอนที่เซลล์มากกว่านี้ เราเองรู้สึกแอบเสียดายตังเล็กๆ แต่อ่านในฟอรั่มเหมือนdevพยายามจะเพิ่มด่านอยู่ เราเลยยังแอบหวังนะ ถือว่าที่กดมาเป็นค่า early access กันไป

*ล่าสุดเกมนี้มีด่านเพิ่มแล้วนะคะ(อีก8ด่าน)ในแง่คำมั่นสัญญานับว่าใจโอเคเลยค่ะ แต่โดยรวมก็ยังค่อนข้างน้อยด่านนะคะ ^____^

author: {'steamid': '76561198020570262', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1497608362}
review: Under Leaves is a beautiful, hidden object game with a soothing soundscape and simple play mechanism. The game does not take long to complete (I've played through twice in my first go), but it is charming and relaxing. I think that this would be a terrific game for children, particularly to join with your child and play together.  As an adult, this will get replayed more for the calming effect than for a challenge.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002805337', 'num_games_owned': 1329, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 654, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 654, 'last_played': 1497460953}
review:
「ウォーリーをさがせ!」系のゲーム
かわいい動物さん達におつかいさせられます。

綺麗な水彩グラフィックとリラックスサウンドに癒やされますが
難易度は意外と高くて、「最後の一個が見つからない！」となった
ステージもちらほら。カジキさんステージが特に難関でした。

一人で黙々と探すのも良いですが、「ウォーリー」を懐かしみつつ
お友達や小さなお子様と一緒に遊べばより楽しめると思います。

対象年齢：3歳くらい～
プレイ時間：2時間

author: {'steamid': '76561198067815636', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 134, 'playtime_forever': 457, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 338, 'last_played': 1558037716}
review:
[h1][u] ОЧЕВИДНОЕ НЕВЕРОВНЯТНОЕ -	[/u] 	[/h1]

[b] [i] вот что такое эта типично чешская по рисовке / мироощущению find & click hiddden objects игра.	[/i]	[/b]

[h1][b] [i] Крч.	[/i]	[/b] 	[/h1]

[b] [i] Здесь вконец офауневшим животным лень самим шаг сделать , чтобы жамку взять . Двадцать одну главу мы осоловело пыхтим , подвижнически пытаясь выцепить им прокорм на различных садистски замороченных картинках-ребусах. Найти слизнячков или там конопельку в дикой природе это вам не в супермаркете кило фейхуи купить . Импрессионистские картинки локаций  тут неизменно выполнены в намеренно монохромной цветовой гамме , глаза сломаешь , пока всё обнаружишь . Поэтому , слепошарый - 	[/i]	[/b]

[h1] [b] [i] За лупу !	[/i]	[/b]	[/h1]

[b] [i] Можно дважды кликнуть курсором , и экран даст zoom X 2 . Так пеленговать коренья и планктон сразу легче . Периодически с нордической хроничностью появлялась мысль спидранить - в данном геймплейном контексте это означало бы с бесконечной методичностью  спамить мышью сплошными линиями сверху вниз , правее , сверху вниз , правее - и т.д. до победного "разминирования" всего скотского продовольствия ... Однако интеллигентность и здоровое воспитание пересилили , и , закончив игру без подсказок , со всеми ачивками , взбудораженный Шутероид зафонтанировал идеями новых искромётных игр в таком же ключе :	[/i]	[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198078973022', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1497176534}
review: The game looks easy, but it' not. Even as an adult I had difficulties to find all animals, especially the snake level was hard for me (try to find green salamanders in the green forest ...). For kids it is simple to play and the music and ambient sound create the feeling as if you are really in that environment. And the artwork is perfect for children! Realistic but sweet. Love the game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198064445036', 'num_games_owned': 1449, 'num_reviews': 168, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1492961819}
review:
Was ist Under Leaves? Ein Suchspiel in welchem Ihr in wunderschönen Screens verschiedene Dinge finde müsst um dann in ein neues Level zu kommen. Das Thema ist hierbei Natur und Tiere und ihr kommt alle 5 Level in alte zurück um dort neue Dinge zu finden. Solltet Ihr etwas nicht finden, könnt Ihr auch ein Puzzelspiel machen mit dessen Lösung Ihr einen Tipp erhaltet wo eines der gesuchten Dinge sich versteckt. Kurz, leider etwas zu teuer, wunderschön und fordernt. Kauft es im Sale.

Falls ihr Wissen wollt was der Fuchs wirklich sagt:http://www.twitch.tv/thebenjaminkendrick

author: {'steamid': '76561197961133543', 'num_games_owned': 1211, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1495273854}
review:
I'll keep this one short. I loved the game. 
Under Leaves is a short game where you have to look for certain objects hidden in these "worlds" (if you want to call them like that). 

+ The Artwork: Wow, i really loved it. Everything was coherent and fited really well. 
+ The Sounddesign: It matched the visual perfectly and i have never feeled annoyed or anything like that
+ The Gamplay: Short, simple but challenging from time to time. There are some puzzles where you can find the thing really easy but some really take time.
+ Helpoption: It was a good thing, that they implemented that into the game. You feel lost or cant find the last thing you need? Just do a little puzzle and well guide you.

- Well the only negative aspect really is that the game is short. Youll probally get around 1 - 1.5h out of this. 

Well is it worth a buy? Definitely! I enjoyed every second i played. I normally calculate 1€ = 1 hour of gameplay, which wasnt the case here BUT the game is visually and audibly worth it. If your not sure about buying it id say wait for a sale but definitely pick it up!

review:
일종의 숨은그림 찾기 게임입니다. 
색깔 및 모양이 비슷비슷하게 보여서 생각외로 
숨은그림을 찾는게 만만치는 않은 게임입니다. 
이따금씩 여유를 가지며 차분하게 몰입하기에는 
괜찮은 게임이긴 합니다만, 눈이 너무 아프네요. 
그럭저럭 시간도 때울겸 도전과제를 목표로 하기에는 
무난한 게임입니다만, 숨은그림 찾기 그 이상도 
그 이하도 아닌 그런 게임이라서 선뜻 추천드리기가 
쉽지 않은 그런 게임입니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198240887392', 'num_games_owned': 365, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 394, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 221, 'last_played': 1562468140}
review: This is immensely soothing.  I was looking for a relaxing game, and searching for shapes in beautiful water-colored scenes with pleasant music was just what I needed.  A small detail that I really appreciated was that objects only appeared in biologically suitable places:  acorns could be found only on the ground or in an oak branch, each flower could appear only on certain types of branches, and so on.   I'm really glad I bought this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198310258024', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 204, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 204, 'last_played': 1494849472}
review:
[b]Under Leaves[/b] - милая и расслабляющая инди-головоломка от разработчиков Circus Atos. Умеренная сложность, приятная атмосфера и отсутствие текста делают игру интересной не только для детей, но и для взрослых.

[b]"Под листьями"[/b], как вы уже поняли, небольшая однозадачная головоломочка. Единственная цель которой, найти нужный предмет в указанном количестве. Искать мы будем на 6 разнообразных локациях, по всем уголкам мира, и входе путешествия поможем 21 животному. Локации будут чередоваться, мы побываем, как на суше, так и в море. Такая перемена не дает игре приесться. Искать так же придется разные предметы. Сложность поуровнево нарастает, от легко находимой рыбки, до хитро спрятанных желудей в листьях, ракушек в камнях и т.д.

Среднее время ее полного прохождения от 1,5 до 2,5 часа, ни много ни мало, в самый раз, чтобы насладиться. Сложность в игре средняя, если проходить без подсказок, то некоторые уровни заставят с ними повозится, поэтому если хотите получить удовольствие и выбить все очивки (последняя: пройти игру без подсказок), то настоятельно рекомендую ими не пользоваться.

Хотелось бы отметить акварельную графику, изюминку данного продукта. Именно она создает такую интересную атмосферу, и лаконично дополняется приятным, ненавязчивым музыкальным сопровождением.

author: {'steamid': '76561198138437975', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1575416066}
review: I'm going to give this a thumbs-up but the game should really be longer. This is a hidden object game all the way. You click on an animal, it gives you an item to find x# of, and then you search the environment for that item. It won't be just one page you're searching and herein lies the challenge. If you get stuck, you'll be looking over multiple scenes multiple times. Under Leaves starts easy but later levels can be quite challenging. At least for me. :p The graphics are unique and beautiful and the music is relaxing and fits each area. You should probably buy this on sale because of the short game length but, if you're a hidden object fan, Under Leaves should definitely be in your library.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081430111', 'num_games_owned': 2542, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1677190514}
review:
[h1]Under Leaves is a cute, colorful, game of hide and seek in which you locate specific items amidst a colorful backdrop. It won’t take very long to complete, but it will charm you every click of the way.[/h1]

https://youtu.be/b2jZm0RRn9w

Under Leaves is clearly aimed at a younger crowd, but by no means does that mean that a more mature gamer can enjoy it. 

Gameplay is simple; you are tasked with finding specific objects or creatures hidden within a colorful themed background by the creatures who inhabit it. Backgrounds are a range of different biomes from different parts of the world: a wintery iceberg, a sultry, colorful rainforest, a forest drenched in fall’s browns and oranges, a sweltering savanna, and the depths of the ocean. Those are my favorite.

Upon finding what you are looking for, you are rewarded with a change in the scene; this includes additional animals, particle effects, and changes in the animal’s positions.

Much of the game’s difficulty comes from the complexity of the backgrounds. There are a lot of shades and shapes that camouflage the shapes and shades you’re looking for. You can zoom by double clicking, after which you can use WASD or click and drag in order to look more closely at the scene. The more sets of objects you find, the more difficult the game becomes, because the found objects will still be on screen and will draw your eye in so that you’ll have to redouble your seeking efforts.

While you’re looking, a peaceful melody or more often the chatter of animals will play, creating a serene atmosphere. The atmosphere is the game's strongest point: musical flourishes accompany the click of the item you are looking for. The chirps and trills of the critters on screen are cute as are the animals themselves which will snuggle up to their young ones, bob around, and otherwise provide eye candy.

If the developer made some interactive wall papers, I’d buy them. The art and atmosphere are just lovely.

.Pros.
[list][*] The game is absolutely charming.
[*] The backdrops you’ll be looking through are beautiful and vibrant. 
[*] Appropriately difficult for both children and more mature gamers.
[*] A great game to complete in an afternoon or to slowly chip away at over the course of a few relaxation sessions.[/list]
.Cons.
[list][*] The game is very short. As enjoyable as the experience is, it only takes about an hour to an hour and a half to complete—depending on how good you are at finding things. [/list]

.Bottom Line.

Under Leaves is a charming seek-and-find for gamers of all ages. If you love animals and are looking for a relaxing way to spend an hour or two, this game is for you. While the content will not take you very long to complete, the sense of wonder that the game's atmosphere creates will stay with you for a while longer.

[code]If you found this review helpful, please give it a thumbs-up. For more reviews like this one follow the [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/gamingwithNtK/curation]NeedtoKnow Gaming Curator[/url] page <3[/code]

author: {'steamid': '76561198042669538', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 133, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1494080071}
review:
[h1]Relaxation Mode is cranked up to 11 in this simplistic watercolour hidden object game.[/h1]

https://youtu.be/22PmPXLsZXU

You start off on a world map with 21 dotted circles on it. Each level is associated with an animal from that region, and as you complete the levels the map gradually fills with pictures of these animals.

You're introduced to a level by clicking the X on the central animal, which then shows you a speech bubble containing several small icons of the objects  you're looking for (small animals, seeds, fish etc), and the number of items to be found. The overall canvas is split between 3-5 screens, and as you find/click the objects you move on to the next either via the white arrows, or by dragging. You can zoom in and out by double-clicking and then drag the screen around to inspect each area of the panel. When you find the final item you then report back to the main animal whereupon there's a very short animation of baby animals appearing, plants growing or a shoal of fish swimming by. And that, ladies and gentlemen, describes the entire game.

There's no options menu, but you can do ALT-ENTER to switch to windowed, which you can drag to resize, but you'll have to use system controls for the sounds.

[h1]Artwork[/h1]

Everything is in watercolour, with themes to match the type of environment: pale blue/ white in the arctic region; bright greens for South American jungle; browns and oranges for Africa and European woodlands; darker greens for Asian forests; dark blues for the Southern Ocean.

You would normally expect a variety of different items to find in this type of game, but here every object in the level is identical apart from being different shades of the same colour. The idea is that the items are camouflaged against the background.

Art is subjective, of course, but for me it's just too basic, with very few elements to hold my interest. Erm, did I mention there are some animals?

[h1]Sound[/h1]

Relaxing background noises of the outdoors: birds twittering, water running, parrots squawking etc. accompanied by gentle piano tinklings and, as expected, zen-like Japanese string instruments.

[h1]Difficulty[/h1]

There is none, really. Half of the game could easily be completed by a 5 year old. The other half I guess you'd need to have reached the grand old age of 7. The zoom feature expands to exactly a quarter of the original screen size, so you can systematically inspect each quarter close-up, and at this point the objects are almost impossible to miss. As if it wasn't easy enough already, there's even a hint option - you have to solve a 3x3 sliding-squares puzzle which is already close to completion before you start and only requires 3-4 moves, which then highlights an undiscovered object.

[h1]Steam[/h1]

There are trading cards and 21 achievements - one for each level, plus one for completing without hints. It's fully cross-platform (Unity game) but no Steam Cloud.

[h1]Value[/h1]

The artwork shows a naive innocence and I think this also extends to the marketing side of things because somebody is blissfully unaware of the quality of games available in this price range. I might pay $1-2 for this to keep the kids happy for a couple of hours, but full price? No chance.

[h1]Verdict[/h1]

I can't resist the urge to make a quip about it being like watching paint dry, literally. It's not quite that bad though. It performs well, no glitches or irritations, and the soothing outdoor sounds can give you the illusion of not being a helpless video game addict, even if you are. It's marginally better than watching cat videos on YouTube - at least there are other animals here.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021527824', 'num_games_owned': 304, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 225, 'last_played': 1577518334}
review:
I have two problems with this game.
First, also the biggest problem for me, is when the ambient music loops, it's very obvious. The music and ambience is beautiful, however when it cuts for a second to loop it really takes me out of it.
Second is the lack of options. It isn't too big of a deal, but a music slider and the option to disable hints would be nice.

Other than those issues, I like this game. It's surprisingly challenging, the music is nice, and it really makes you appreciate the attention to detail in the wonderfully illustrated scenes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054469963', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 77, 'last_played': 1606659337}
review:
Especially recommended for children since the UI requires no reading and the material is suitable for all ages.

With cute watercolour aesthetic, nature sounds and clever use of camourflage, this is an absolute delight! I wish more hidden object games were along these lines.  Objects are also found in logical, or should I say natural, places. No moonlogic to be found. It is rather short if you have a keen eye or play a lot of this genre.

review:
Very nice and relaxing game. The layers keep adding up to the scenery once you progress through the game. The help function is nice too (in order to get the hint you have to complete a puzzle). Some of the things to find are quite difficult while some are easier. 

For about 4 euros this game is a bit too short. I would love to see more levels to this game later. Would definitely recommend if you are looking for a brain tease game which will relax you as well.

author: {'steamid': '76561198237018508', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 542, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 277, 'last_played': 1663495232}
review:
This is a cute hidden object game. You are moving through a forest/ jungle/ savannah/ bottom of the ocean etc. exploring the habitat of different animals. The goal is to find various different items for each creature (fish for a polar bear etc.) The game is very simple though it can be hard to find some of the objects at times as they all blend so well with the environment. There is a hint button in form of a sliding puzzle if you get stuck. The location of the items changes slightly with every play through so the game has some  replayability.  
 
The game is visually beautiful. The blend of watercolor illustrations and subtle music sets a very relaxing tone.  
 
I'd not recommend the game to those who like story driven or action filled games as there is none of that in here. It's a more relaxing, meditative, anxiety-reducing kind of game. Good for young children or those who want to unwind for a bit.

author: {'steamid': '76561198320990580', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 132, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 132, 'last_played': 1493445403}
review:
又名大家来找茬
实际上是个色盲测试谱（X
有些地方真的还挺难找的…尤其像我这样一个有点绿色色弱的人来讲真的有点不友好…
画风很可爱，音乐也不错，游戏整体是个线性流程，这关通不过就下一关就没法玩，双击可放大区域，超过一定时间找不到右边会出现一个问号提示，完成拼图即可获得提示，提示可无限用，讲道理个人觉得拼图还比找东西好玩…结果到最后变成一直在玩拼图了（（（结果出来后发现有个不使用提示完成游戏的成就（（（（
所以说玩游戏前看成就很重要啊！！（谁叫你蠢
17的价钱感觉还是有点贵了，毕竟可玩性一般般，关卡也有点少了，可以等更低点点的价格购买
不过画面很好看，可以做壁纸0w0
最后祝君在检测视力的路上玩得愉快！

author: {'steamid': '76561198043366093', 'num_games_owned': 953, 'num_reviews': 142, 'playtime_forever': 174, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 158, 'last_played': 1516977958}

author: {'steamid': '76561198048610394', 'num_games_owned': 1508, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1493309143}
review: A fun short game you can play with your kids or for relaxing. Sometimes it's quite hard to spot the object but you have a help button which you can press to get help so it's not frustrating at all.

author: {'steamid': '76561198113862025', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 298, 'playtime_forever': 83, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83, 'last_played': 1493298299}
review:
Si je trouve Under Leaves aussi charmant que réussi, il m'aura fallu un peu moins d'1h30 pour en voir le bout en ayant déverrouillé l'intégralité de ses 21 succès (c'est à dire sans jamais faire appel aux indices - ce qui aurait encore beaucoup réduit sa durée de vie).
La question à se poser est donc : "vaut il son prix de base de 5€"?

À cette question, je réponds non - mais sans pour autant vous déconseiller ce jeu sympa et bien réalisé si vous aimez le genre : chopez le sans souci lorsqu'il sera correctement soldé.
[i](Je l'estime trop cher sachant qu'il n'est pas rare de trouver des jeux du genre à la durée de vie 5 fois supérieure, vendus de base moitié moins cher - comme l'excellent "Rusty Lake : Roots" par exemple).[/i]

Si Under leaves ne révolutionne rien, il se donne en revanche les moyens de ses modestes prétentions, et réussit très bien tout ce qu'il semble ambitionner : Il est vraiment mignon, bien réalisé, très relaxant, artistiquement irréprochable (tant sur le plan esthétique que musical et sonore, avec une apaisante bande-son basée sur les bruits de la nature)...
Son interface complètement dépourvue de texte est universellement compréhensible, lisible et bien pensée.

En terme de difficulté, les niveaux sont généralement assez enfantins, même si certains poseront un peu plus de problème - mais rien qui ne résiste à un ratissage minutieux et méthodique des écrans.

Pour chacun des 20 tableaux, on ne vous demandera de trouver qu'une seule sorte de "forme" (objet ou animal), toujours de la même taille - mais dans différentes teintes.
Par moment, la difficulté réside principalement dans le fait que l'objet à chercher est très petit, ou que la teinte est très similaire à celle du fond, donc conseil : oubliez ce jeu si vous jouez sur un petit écran. (Surtout qu'il ne me semble pas avoir vu de possibilité de zoomer - et heureusement en un sens, car le jeu en serait devenu encore plus facile - et donc plus court - qu'il ne l'est déjà).

Le jeu a le bon goût de faire preuve d'une certaine logique : vous trouverez tous les vers de terre au niveau du sol, les fleurs au bout de leurs tiges, et les étoiles de mer dans les fonds marins, et non en train de crapahuter sur un nuage, comme dans certains jeux du genre.
Même si c'est un détail, le fait que l'environnement des animaux et des objets à trouver soit cohérent est un bon point je trouve.

Je regrette en revanche que les 6 environnements disponibles soient aussi recyclés tout au long des 20 niveaux proposés - seuls les animaux et leurs "requêtes" changent dans ces 6 grands "tableaux" (qui se déclinent chacun en plusieurs écrans).

Pas grand chose à reprocher à Under Leaves donc, si ce n'est d'être extrêmement court et plutôt surévalué en terme de prix, comme je l'ai déjà signalé en introduction.
Pour le reste, c'est un (tout petit) jeu 100% objets cachés, attachant et très correct, que je conseille volontiers aux amateurs du genre si vous le trouvez à moins de 3€.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042023224', 'num_games_owned': 1596, 'num_reviews': 1033, 'playtime_forever': 323, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1517385433}
review:
자연을 벗삼은 유유자적 숨은그림찾기 게임.

각 동물들이 부탁하는 물건들을 찾아준다. 지도는 세계지도인데 큰 대륙으로 뭉쳐있으면 같은 장소로 취급하는 것 같다. 지구는 하나. 위아더 월드 같은건가. 그래도 그림체도 애들 그림책 보는 느낌이고 음악도 잔잔한게 참 좋다. 포근한 느낌의 게임이고 잔잔한 감성을 자극하는 힐링 게임이다.

찾는 것들은 어지간하면 그리 어렵지 않은 곳에 놓여있다. 잘 안 보이면 힌트를 써도 되고 말이다. 그래도 게임을 하다보면 꼭 마지막 단 한 개가 안보여 머리를 싸매게 된다. 그래도 기왕이면 조급하게 힌트를 눌러볼 게 아니라 차분히 화면을 살펴보자. 느긋하게 화면을 살펴보다 보면 어떻게든 답이 보인다. 애초에 느긋하게 하는 게임이니 조급해하지 말고 느긋하게 즐기도록 하자. 힌트 안 쓰고 게임 다 깨는 도전과제도 있고 하니 말이다.

힐링용으로 딱 좋은 숨은그림찾기 게임.

http://blog.naver.com/kitpage/220994206677

author: {'steamid': '76561198204807504', 'num_games_owned': 544, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 261, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 261, 'last_played': 1493492592}
review: A beautiful, relaxing puzzle/hidden object game. I played it through in one sitting (about 2 hours) and enjoyed it a lot! The watercolor art is stunning! Even though it is quite short, I feel that it definitely has replay value and the price seems fitting aswell. The game also has a hint system (in form of an additional puzzle) in case you get stuck. If you need something to relax with, I would definitely recommend giving Under Leaves a try!
